EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thanks for viewing the Doctor Evidence self-paced materials housed on our learning management system. Attached please find quick-guides to help you navigate DOC Search.
You have access to DOC Search, as well as DOC Library and DOC Data, through a Single-sign on (SSO) system. Please use your existing Sanofi credentials to login to the Doctor Evidence Platform, including DOC Search, by navigating to: https://sanofi.doctorevidence.com/
To initiate a project with DRE, please complete this brief form: https://reports.doctorevidence.com/pages/Client/ServiceProject.aspx.
Please let us know by replying to this email if you are interested in a customized webinar training on using DRE's platforms, including our analytical platform, DOC Data, to review a body of evidence, to export data for deliverables and to conduct analyses.
Sincerely,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 847.507.1451
